```{r setup}
library(econWeb)
```

## Step 1

Select the UI frame to export then right click to choose **Copy/Paste as** > **Copy as CSS**

## Step 2

In R
```{r}
fig <- Fig()
```

## Step 3

View fundamental UI
```{r}
fig$ui() |> browseTag2()
```

## Step 4 

Adjust frame inner text/html

```{r}
fig$div |> names()
```

```{r}
fig$ui() -> tag_ui
tagQ <- tagQuery(tag_ui)
tagQ$find(".card-content-teacher-word")$append("前往VoiceTube 聽 Leila 老師如何應用單字")
tagQ$find(".card-content-btn-level")$append("A2 level")
tagQ$find(".card-content-word-explain")$append("adj. 虛弱的；欺詐的
n. 戲法；竅門；訣竅；把戲；特技")
tagQ$find(".card-content-word-pronun")$append("US /trɪk/       US /trɪk/")
tagQ$find(".card-content-word-title")$append("TRICK")
tagQ$selectedTags() |>
  browseTag2()

```
